name: Custom sketch card
description:
This commission is for an original artist sketch card (a 2.5" x 3.5" card). please include what you'd like me to draw for you in the Facebook notes!

the card will be executed in marker mixed with ink, colored pencil, etc. they are on my own card stock, with my information on the back.

PLEASE let me know if you'd like me to draw the card in my more "cute" style or my more comic book style (sexier, etc). if you have a specific costume for a character in mind, let me know things like that too!

if you'd like a 2 or 3 panel card, e-mail me and we can work that out. also, if you want to order more than 5 cards, e-mail me and we may be able to work out a discount for multiple cards. Each card is $5.00. 

the images shown in the listing are SAMPLES of the cards i can draw for you. they are NOT cards that i currently have available. sorry!

name: original CUSTOM 9" x 12" piece
description:
The mega-popular mini paintings i do, come to the internet!

you can have me paint a favorite comic character, movie character, animal, beloved pet, food, person... whatever you can think of!

these paintings are 9"x12" and are all done in black pen and Prismacolor on Bristol. Pieces are delivered in a protective acid free sleeve.

you MUST let me know what you'd like in the wepay notes! otherwise... i'm just going to paint whatever i'd like and you'll get a painting of a cheesecake... or a happy burrito. (Iâ€™m totally kidding, but PLEASE let me know)

if it is a portrait of a pet/person, then you can send me a reference photo to lexiisjunk@gmail.com. I normally only do one character per card. i can do 2 characters/pets/etc. though!

if you have a really elaborate idea for a mini painting, let me know and we'll see if we can work something out.

name: original CUSTOM 11" x 14"
description:
A custom commish piece of your choice! You can have me paint a favorite comic character, movie character, animal, beloved pet, food, person... whatever you can think of!

These paintings are 11"x14" and are all done in black pen and Prismacolor on Bristol. All pieces are sent in a protective acid free sleeve.

name: original CUSTOM 11" x 17"
description:
Bigger really is better!!! 

a CUSTOM 11" x 17" Color and Ink painting! (see the sample image for an idea of what style/look you'll be getting!)

a favorite cute food to hang in your kitchen?
a portrait of your pet? 
a favorite character for your kids' room? 
a favorite character for YOUR room?

this price is limited to 1-4ish characters (more are allowed depending on complexity. have 6 cats? i'll still paint 6 cats for this price in one 11" x 17" piece!). if you want every spiderman nemesis on one piece, we'll have to talk about a new price. e-mail me before you purchase or leave an FB message on Lexi's Junk

name: original CUSTOM 19" x 24" piece
description: Bigger is Better. A custom piece of your choice.
